subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Cilic, who won the U.S. Open men’s singles title last year but has not reached a tournament final in 2015, continued his quiet rise, defeating Jérémy Chardy.
snippet: Cilic, who won the U.S. Open men’s singles title last year but has not reached a tournament final in 2015, continued his quiet rise, defeating Jérémy Chardy.
